thread.title: Penguins look to add Crosby, Malkin to penalty-kill mix
thread.title_full: Penguins look to add Crosby, Malkin to penalty-kill mix

title: Penguins look to add Crosby, Malkin to penalty-kill mix
text:
Published By: Pittsburgh Post: Penguins - Today 
Jordan Staal scored seven short-handed goals as a rookie in 2006-07. Sidney Crosby and Evgeni Malkin have seven, too....
